Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Cosmos DB region, with spaces between words and each word capitalized.
The instanceId GUID of a restorable database account.
Docs.summary: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB databases under the restorable account. This helps in scenario where database was accidentally deleted to get the deletion time. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission
